content.description: Start on horizontal slopey crimps, pull the first move to a good side pull. The first move is the crux, and the problem is pretty much done after that. Holds will probably be sandy, so be careful!
content.location: Wash Out starts to the right of Proud Mary.

content.description: Begin by sit starting with one hand on and edge and one on a jug

Starting on the good start holds of Jimbo's, head right on good crimps and jugs. Hit a huge jug in the middle of the face and go straight up to two incut crimpers. From here, move your left hand once more into a good, slightly slopey jug, hike your feet up and do a hard move to the final hold. Ultra classic. One of the only problems in the v6 range in So iLL on jugs!
content.protection: Pads and spotters optional. I have fallen topping this out and completely missed the pad and fell into the sand and I didn't think it hurt at all.
content.location: The big overhanging face of the Sex on the Beach boulder, the huge block you encounter when you arrive at the Beach. The obvious line of good holds. Walk down off the boulder to get off.

content.description: Begin with high hands on an edge. Climb up the low angled face.
If you catch the sand low enough, sit start directly below "Proud Mary" on minuscule crimps and bunchy feet. Crimp your face off and dead point to the start of "Proud Mary."
content.location: Sit start to "Proud Mary." The second problem from climber's right under the main overhang of SOB boulder.

content.description: This extremely overhung line follows incut crimpers to the top of the boulder. Starting on two small jugs, either explode up and right to a small but positive crimp or reach your left hand to a bad slopey edge and lock off to the incut crimp. From here, get your left foot very high, and get left hand to a small gaston far away, using the incut intermediate next to it or just going straight to it. Grab a couple good holds and do a simple top out. As far as I know, this is the second hardest problem at the Beach. A lower start on two bad crimps may be possible when the sand is low... So iLL strong men, get out there!
content.location: Right side of the overhung Sex on the Beach face. Walk off boulder to get off.

content.description: This is the sit start for Loose Lucy
content.location: To the left of Dog Fight
Pocketed face to the right of Wash Out

content.description: Begin this problem with your left hand in a pocket and your right hand in a crack feature. Layback to the top.

climbs.name: Mississippi Mud aka Wash out Low

content.description: If the sand is low enough, begin on small, flat edges directly below the start holds of "Wash Out." A few hard, tension moves on slopey crimps set you up for the crux deadpoint of "Wash Out."
content.location: The far right problem under the main overhang of the SOB boulder.

content.description: Proud Mary/Sex on the Beach link-up. Start on Mary, do some moves to gain the jug of Sex, finish on that. Found this on a local guy's 8a.nu page while I was looking around for obscure boulder problems...clever name...sounds fun man!
content.protection: Whatever you used for Sex on the Beach, plus a pad near Proud Mary

content.description: There are a lot of holds on the arete, so the beta can be hard to read. There are a couple variations on the problem, but I began the problem starting on two holds on opposite sides of the arete, doing a big move up and left. A couple more weird slopey moves will put you on top. Not the best problem at the Beach, but not bad either.
content.location: Faint arete to the left of Jimbo's

content.description: Begin with hands in a slot.
content.location: To the left of Dog Fight

content.description: Starting standing on good holds, move upwards to a big cruxy huck to a nice sandstone sloper. Top out the boulder. The classic warm up of the Beach. Awesome, overhanging sandstone action.
content.protection: A pad or two, if you want
content.location: Facing the main overhanging face of the Sex on the Beach boulder, it is just right of the slight arete on the left side of the face.

content.description: Start on Jimbo's/Sex on the Beach shared start. When you get to the huge jug shelf on SOB, jump to a slot up and left. Top out on bad slopers directly above.
content.location: Tops out in between Jimbo's and SOB.

content.description: Start on high edges and pull a difficult move to shelf above.
content.location: Starts on the opposite side of Sex on the Beach problem.

content.description: Sit start to Mark's Arete. Begin on a right hand pocket/edge and left-hand pinch.
content.location: A couple of feet left of the shared start for Jimbo's, CBO, SOB.

content.description: Begin by sitting on ground with hands on a jug. Reach to the right for a sloper.

This is one of the first boulders you will encounter and one of the best!  Perfect sandy landings around the block with ten or so problems circling the boulder.  The steep southern side hosts the namesake problem "Sex on the Beach" (V4)
